summary: Code review and local testing of horizontal swipe navigation implementation on three screens (Legal Documents, Cases, Laws & Schemes). App renders correctly locally with all tabs, swipe indicators, and content visible. External URL (app.emergent.sh) shows Emergent platform login page instead of app preview - this is expected behavior for the preview environment.
critical_code_review_comments: PanResponder implementation is correct - uses onMoveShouldSetPanResponder to detect horizontal swipes (dx > dy) with 10px threshold before capturing gesture
Swipe threshold of 50px is appropriate for distinguishing intentional swipes from accidental touches
Vertical scrolling is preserved by only capturing horizontal gestures (Math.abs(gestureState.dx) > Math.abs(gestureState.dy))
Swipe indicator dots correctly sync with activeTab/selectedCategoryIndex state
Tab tap navigation works via TouchableOpacity with onPress handlers
data-testid attributes are properly added for tabs (tab-create, tab-documents, tab-saved, case-tab-ongoing, etc.)
Template cards display in 2-column grid (width: 47%) with proper icons and colors
Cases summary card shows correct counts from getCaseCounts() function
Laws screen has horizontal scrollable category chips plus swipe gesture for category switching

POTENTIAL ISSUE: PanResponder is created with useRef but activeTab/selectedCategoryIndex are used inside - this may cause stale closure issues. Consider using useCallback or updating panResponder when state changes
seed_data_creation: None - using existing mock data in casesData.ts and lawsData.ts
context_for_next_testing_agent: App is React Native/Expo running on web. External URL shows Emergent login page - need to test via internal localhost:3000 or wait for proper preview URL. Swipe navigation implemented using PanResponder. All three screens (documents, cases, laws) have tab navigation with swipe indicators. Mock data is used for cases and laws.

mocked_files: /app/frontend/services/casesData.ts - Mock case data with CRUD operations
